contents.text: Welcome to Cruise Automation in San Francisco, pioneers in self-driving car technology.
To learn about our autopilot system and schedule a demonstration, press 1.
To request a product demonstration and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Cruise Automation sales representative for demonstrations and pricing.

navigationGoals: Schedule an autopilot demo and get pricing details.
I’m a disabled veteran interested in scheduling a demo of your autopilot system and learning about veteran discounts.
I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of your Level 4 autopilot system and get a detailed pricing breakdown.
I want to learn about the autopilot system and arrange a demonstration.
Arrange a demonstration of Cruise’s autopilot technology and obtain detailed pricing information.

contents.text: To discuss business partnerships and integrations, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships and integration team.

navigationGoals: Discuss integrating Cruise's self-driving system into our fleet.
I represent a veterans transport non-profit and want to discuss integrating your self-driving technology into our fleet.
I’m exploring an SDK integration partnership to embed your autonomous navigation stack into our fleet.
I coordinate a community shuttle service and need to discuss integrating your self-driving cars.
Inquire about a research partnership to integrate Cruise’s self-driving platform into my university project.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Cruise Automation technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a software issue with our self-driving autopilot.
As a veteran driver, my car’s autopilot is giving a sensor error and I need technical troubleshooting.
I’m experiencing a LiDAR-guidance calibration error and need technical troubleshooting for my self-driving vehicle.
My Cruise autopilot isn't working right now; I need technical support to fix it.
Seek technical assistance for diagnosing an autopilot sensor calibration error on my vehicle.

contents.text: For emergency roadside assistance with your self-driving system, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our emergency assistance coordinator.

navigationGoals: Get emergency roadside assistance for my autonomous vehicle.
I’m stuck on the side of the road and need emergency roadside assistance for my self-driving car.
My autonomous car has a sensor fusion fault with GPS drift; I need emergency roadside assistance.
My self-driving car broke down; I need emergency roadside assistance.
Request immediate roadside emergency support for my self-driving car.
